data.name: Who is responsible for the benefits reviews execution and planning throughout...

data.stimulus: PRINCE2 products for managing change should include:

data.name: Which is a reason why the 'defined roles and responsibilities' principle must...
data.stimulus: Which is a reason why the 'defined roles and responsibilities' principle must be applied?

options.label: Because each project will have unique outputs
Because more than one function may be involved in the project
Because projects may have duplicated or inconsistent objectives
Because stages provide senior management with control points

data.name: What is established within the 'initiating a project' process?
data.stimulus: What is established within the 'initiating a project' process?

options.label: The different ways that the project product can be delivered
The formats for communicating project information to stakeholders
That all of the information to develop the project brief is available
That any constraints which could affect the project have been removed

data.name: Which is a benefit of using PRINCE2?
data.stimulus: Which is a benefit of using PRINCE2?

options.label: It provides established and proven best practice and governance for project management
It includes techniques for critical path analysis and earned value analysis
It enables a project manager to be accountable for the success of a project
It prevents any changes after the scope of a project has been agreed

data.stimulus: Which statements about a project's stakeholders are CORRECT? 1 - A stakeholder is anyone who thinks they will be affected by a project. 2 - Stakeholders require equal amounts of engagement by the project management team. 3 - Stakeholders remain unchanged throughout the project. 4 - A stakeholder may be internal or external to the corporate organization.

data.name: What is a PRINCE 2 Plan theme?
data.stimulus: What is a PRINCE 2 Plan theme?

options.label: A document describing how, when and by whom a specific target or set of targets to be achieved
A diagram showing the sequence of production of the planned products.
The optimum mix of information used in determining whether a Project is viable, desirable and achievable.
The essence of the change theme is to identify, access and control any potential and approved changes to the product baseline.

data.name: A plan enables the project team to understand which of the following?
data.stimulus: A plan enables the project team to understand which of the following?

options.label: What products need to be delivered
The risks; both opportunities and threats
Any issues with the definition of the scope

data.name: Which statement about the 'continued business justification' principle is ...
data.stimulus: Which statement about the 'continued business justification' principle is CORRECT?

options.label: The justification for compulsory projects does not need approval
There must be no change to the reasons for a project
A formal business case document is mandatory
The chosen option must provide value for money

data.name: Which is the purpose of the Change theme?
data.stimulus: Which is the purpose of the Change theme?

options.label: Identify, assess and control any potential and approved changes to baselined products
Establish mechanisms to monitor and compare actual achievements against those planned

data.name: What must be produced, as a minimum requirement for applying the plans theme?
data.stimulus: What must be produced, as a minimum requirement for applying the plans theme?

options.label: A hierarchy of all the products to be produced during a plan
A record of the issues that are being formally managed during a plan
A diagram showing the sequence of production of the planned products
A record of the major risks relating to the project plan
